All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
DatabaseController
DatabaseController provides functionality for creating, reading, updating, and deleting recipes, ingredients, utensils, allergens, and photos.
Log
Log provides simple functionality for logging events by class.
NotFoundAdvice
NotFoundAdvice provides HTTP 404 responses when requests attempt to access or modify content that does not exist.
NotFoundException
NotFoundException should be thrown if a request attempts to access or modify content that does not exist.
RateLimitAdvice
RateLimitAdvice provides HTTP 429 responses to throttled requests.
RateLimitException
RateLimitException should be thrown if a request is throttled.
Recipe
Recipe stores a single recipe.
RecipeBuddyApplication
The SpringBootApplication class used to start RecipeBuddy.
RecipeBuddyController
RecipeBuddyController defines and implements the API calls that we support.
RecipeBuddyMap
Stores constants that are accessed by multiple classes
ResourceUpdateAdvice
ResourceUpdateAdvice provides HTTP 500 responses to failed requests.
ResourceUpdateException
ResourceUpdateException should be thrown if an attempt to modify a resource specified by a request fails.
Result
Result stores a single Recipe and its score as a double.
Search
Search holds the parameters of a single user search.
SearchHandler
SearchHandler provides functionality for searching recipes.
